title: 1.1. Template Editor Introduction
intro: The Template Editor allows individuals to create, manage templates and to perform a variety of enterprise managed process flow tasks on those templates. In this section we will outline the various user interface elements, what they do and how to access them.

blocks.content: To access the Template Editor simply navigate via the top menu of the FieldLogs website by selecting 'Templates'. This will load the following screen:

points.text: At the top of the screen
Alternatively: follow the Quickstart Guide to view the Template Editor
